Услуги

  • Облачни услуги

  • Мобилни приложения

    With the "explosion" in the mobile devices usage, we decided to ride our part of the wave, specializing in building Android, iOS and Windows Phone native and hybrid apps. These apps quite often require more than just the pretty native user interface, but could also involve on-premise SQL Server or Azure SQL Database, Blob storage and push notification systems integration.

  • Уеб

    Our skills in ASP.NET/MVC, HTML5 and JavaScript help us create compelling web systems with responsive design. The concepts we follow and the architectures we create are in the foundation of making it possible to meet the scale and global reach of any demand.

  • Облачни услуги

    Our skills in ASP.NET/MVC, HTML5 and JavaScript help us create compelling web systems with responsive design. The concepts we follow and the architectures we create are in the foundation of making it possible to meet the scale and global reach of any demand.

Технологии

We have experience in the latest technologies and modern platforms for rapid prototyping, accelerated time to market and superior maintainability.

  • HTML5/CSS3
  • JavaScript, jQuery, Angular, Knockout
  • ASP.NET, ASP.NET Web API, ASP.NET MVC
  • Xamarin Platform for native mobile apps on C#
  • Microsoft Azure Cloud Computing Platform & Services

Процес

Agile software development with Scrum – for responding to change in fast-paced, less complex R&D projects. Agile works for cases with many uncertainties, requiring active involvement from the Product Owner (customer) and iterative prototyping to meet stakeholder needs.

We work side by side with our customers, combining their domain knowledge with our technology experience to create software products that meet stakeholders’ every need.

  • Rapid prototyping

    When time and money are a constraint, mistakes must be made fast and inexpensively. We try to understand our applications’ users before we even begin to commit code by creating interactive mock-ups and using them to collect stakeholder feedback.

  • Fast time to market

    We step on the developer community’s leading frameworks (i.e. Angular 2) and platforms (i.e. Xamarin or Telerik Platform) to accelerate development and ship scalable, reliable and maintainable code.

  • 100% transparency

    When projects are managed with the Scrum methodology, the customer, as the Product Owner, is given access in Visual Studio Online. This brings transparency in the development process and creates trust that our team’s performance and outputs match your expectations.

Клиенти
